Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
SupportedServers_Description: Mailserver hostnames or IP addresses the feature is enabled for, * enables the feature for all accounts.
DbUser_Description: User of database used by mailserver for storing credentials
DbPass_Description: Password of database used by mailserver for storing credentials
DbName_Description: Name of database used by mailserver for storing credentials
DbHost_Description: Hostname of database server used by mailserver for storing credentials
